message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
Meet me halfway, Alice. Let's split it down the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Consider this a fair offer, Bob.
You're getting closer to my number, Alice. But I still think I deserve more. This is my revised offer.
I'm getting close to your number, Bob. But I'm not quite there yet. Meet me in the middle again?
I'm not budging much, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
